title: Part 1
subtitle: Invocations

title: Part 2
subtitle: Bridging of the ocean by Nala and Nīla; Śrī Rāma's installation of Śrī Rāmeśvara

title: Part 3
subtitle: Śrī Rāma crosses the ocean with the whole army and encamps on Mount Suvela; Rāvaṇa feels agitated at the news

title: Part 4
subtitle: Mandodarī expostulates with Rāvaṇa; dialogue between Rāvaṇa and Prahasta (his son)

title: Part 5
subtitle: A mental view of Śrī Rāma on Mount Suvela and a description of the rising moon

title: Part 6
subtitle: An arrow from Śrī Rāma's bow strikes down Rāvaṇa's diadems and umbrella

title: Part 7
subtitle: Mandodarī makes remonstrance with Rāvaṇa again and dwells upon Śrī Rāma's glory

title: Part 8
subtitle: Aṅgada's departure for Laṅkā and dialogue between Aṅgada and Rāvaṇa in the latter's court

title: Part 9
subtitle: Mandodarī offers advice to Rāvaṇa once more

title: Part 10
subtitle: Dialogue between Aṅgada and Śrī Rāma; conflict actually begins

title: Part 11
subtitle: conflict actually begins

title: Part 12
subtitle: Mālyavān's admonition to Rāvaṇa

title: Part 13
subtitle: The battle recommences; encounter between Lakṣmaṇa and Meghanāda; a javelin thrown by the latter strikes Lakṣmaṇa in the breast

title: Part 14
subtitle: Hanumān fetches the physician Suṣeṇa and proceeds in quest of the life-giving herb; dialogue between Kālanemi and Rāvaṇa, redemption of the she-alligator; deliverance of Kālanemi

title: Part 15
subtitle: Struck by Bharata's arrow, Hanumān drops down unconscious; dialogue between Bharata and Hanumān

title: Part 16
subtitle: Śrī Rāma's sport of a frantic wail; Hanumān's return; Lakṣmaṇa's coming back to consciousness

title: Part 17
subtitle: Rāvaṇa awakes Kumbhakarṇa; Kumbhakarṇa's exhortation to Rāvaṇa and dialogue between Vibhīṣaṇa and Kumbhakarṇa

title: Part 18
subtitle: Kumbhakarṇa joins the beale and attains final beatitude

title: Part 19
subtitle: Meghanāda gives battle and Śrī Rāma sportfully allows Himself to be bound by a snare of serpents

title: Part 20
subtitle: Destruction of Meghanāda's sacrificial performance; his engagement on the battle-field and deliverance at the hands of Lakṣmaṇa

title: Part 21
subtitle: Rāvana's march to the field of battle; Śrī Rāma's victory-chariot and an encounter between the monkeys and the demons

title: Part 22
subtitle: Encounter between Lakṣmaṇa and Rāvaṇa

title: Part 23
subtitle: Rāvaṇa's swoon; destruction of his sacrificial performance; combat between Śrī Rāma and Rāvaṇa

title: Part 24
subtitle: Indra (the lord of paradise) sends a chariot for the use of Śrī Rāma; encounter between Śrī Rāma and Rāvaṇa

title: Part 25
subtitle: Rāvaṇa hurls a lance at Vibhīṣaṇa : Śrī Rāma puts Vibhīṣaṇa behind Him and exposes Himself to its full force; encounter between Vibhīṣaṇa and Rāvaṇa

title: Part 26
subtitle: Combat of Rāvaṇa and Hanumān; Rāvaṇa creates phantoms and Śrī Rāma disperses the phantoms

title: Part 27
subtitle: Fierce fighting; Rāvaṇa's swoon

title: Part 28
subtitle: Dialogue between Sītā and Trijaṭā

title: Part 29
subtitle: Final encounter between Śrī Rāma and Rāvaṇa; end of Rāvaṇa; shouts of victory everywhere

title: Part 30
subtitle: Mandodarī and other queens lament; Rāvaṇa's funeral

title: Part 31
subtitle: Vibhīṣaṇa's installation

title: Part 32
subtitle: Hanumān carries the happy news to Sītā; Sītā rejoins Sti Rāma and enters fire as a test of her purity

title: Part 33
subtitle: The gods sing the Lord's praises; Indra rains down nectar on the dead

title: Part 34
subtitle: Vibhīṣaṇa's entreaty; Śrī Rāma portrayal and Bharata's condition by due to the excessive love he bore towards the Lord; Śrī Rāma urges Vibhīṣaṇa to arrange His speedy return to Ayodhyā

title: Part 35
subtitle: Vibhīṣaṇa rains down clothes and ornaments from the air and the monkeys and bears pick them up and adorn their person with them

title: Part 36
subtitle: Śrī Rāma and Sītā leave for Ayodhyā on the aerial car, Puṣpaka
